comments:
Build: 20020319

Description: When running the SWT examples with the workbench, you cannot run 
any of the standalone applications. They work fine if you run them from the 
first eclipse, but if you try to run them from the launcher in the second 
version of eclipse the application is not found and an exception is thrown.

java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException: 
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Application not found: 
org.eclipse.swt.examples.launcher.application
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.boot.InternalBootLoader.run
(InternalBootLoader.java:775)

Exception launching the Eclipse Platform UI:

	at org.eclipse.core.boot.BootLoader.run(BootLoader.java:319)
	at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Native Method)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.basicRun(Main.java:196)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.run(Main.java:555)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.UIMain.main(UIMain.java:52)
I suspect this is a configuration problem. Ask VI about it.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 11730 ***
